data.text: @Cracker_Jack340 @SteveDaines Good question. I'm paying an average of 250 a month for a sm 5th wheel trailer house.
@SteveDaines ICE is an armed, masked gang of thugs. AI is a bubble set to implode. Steve Daines is all in on both.
@SteveDaines What are you doing to help Montana farmers? 👇😡 https://t.co/G6f1icIr5W

@SteveDaines The people of Iran demand the fall of the Islamic Republic. After 40,000+ deaths, we reject any nuclear deal. This regime can only be changed by foreign military intervention. Its nuclear program is dangerous for the world. We want freedom.

@SteveDaines …from huge data centers that will, of course be used for surveillance AI, enrich my billionaire buddies and, yes, you my hearty constituents will ultimately pay the bills for electricity and, lose your water.”

@SteveDaines We’re going to have higher bills while our rivers run low because Republicans are pushing AI data centers. It’s a combination of stupidity and corruption that is guaranteed to harm Montanans. We need to ban data centers!
@SteveDaines When will our energy bills become affordable?
